types.type: typedef void (*EGLSetBlobFuncANDROID) (const void *key, EGLsizeiANDROID keySize, const void *value, EGLsizeiANDROID valueSize);
typedef EGLsizeiANDROID (*EGLGetBlobFuncANDROID) (const void *key, EGLsizeiANDROID keySize, void *value, EGLsizeiANDROID valueSize);
typedef void ( *EGLDEBUGPROCKHR)(EGLenum error,const char *command,EGLint messageType,EGLLabelKHR threadLabel,EGLLabelKHR objectLabel,const char* message);

enums.comment: Reserved for enumerants shared with WGL, GLX, and GL
Tokens whose numeric value is intrinsically meaningful
Reserved for Tim Renouf, Antix (Khronos bug 4949)
Reserved for Sree Sridharan (Khronos public bug 198)
Reserved for Brian Murray, Freescale (Khronos bug 5939)
Reserved for Maurice Ribble (Khronos bug 6644) - EGL_QCOM_create_image spec
Reserved for Daniel Koch, ANGLE Project (Khronos bug 7139)

enum.name: EGL_BUFFER_COUNT_NV
enum.comment: From EGL_NV_stream_producer_eglsurface, which has no known specification and was replaced by a KHR extension

enums.comment: Reserved for Gary Sweet, Broadcom (Public bug 620)
Reserved for John Kåre Alsaker (Public bug 757)
Reserved for Jeff Vigil (Bug 10663) - EGL_QCOM_lock_image2 spec
Reserved for Jeff Vigil (Bug 11735) - EGL_QCOM_gpu_perf spec
Reserved for Jeff Vigil (Bugs 12973,12849) - EGL_EXT_yuv_surface spec TBD
Reserved for Courtney Goeltzenleuchter - ANGLE (gitlab EGL bug 7)
Reserved for Courtney Goeltzenleuchter - Android (gitlab EGL bug 69)
For Mark Callow, Khronos bug 4055. Shared with GL.

require.comment: EGL_KHR_surfaceless_context - just relaxes an error condition
Supported only if EGL_KHR_stream_cross_process_fd is supported
